issue.title: jp.xero.porn
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [NSFW] [https://jp.xero.porn/video/cryylblnyulaoi5p368810](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fjp.xero.porn%2Fvideo%2Fcryylblnyulaoi5p368810) ### Comment > Screenshot 1: Press ☓, which seems to be left unerased. > Screenshot 2: Delete the cookie. > Screenshot 3: Press the hard-to-see play button. > Screenshot 4: An empty tab opens behind. > Screenshot 5: Empty tab URL (https://syndication.realsrv.com/splash.php). > Screenshot 6: Press ☓ that reappears. > Screenshot 7: Press the hard-to-see play button again. > Screenshot 8: Click the play button moved to the upper left twice. > Screenshot 9: Playback starts. ### [NSFW] Screenshots

issue.title: Chrome newtab popup
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Mac

### AdGuard version

2.8.1.1140

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

newtab

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests, Disable cache for third-party requests, Hide your Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Hide your User-Agent (specify in comment below, if used custom value)

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Can it be blocked? Also sent to filters@adguard.com saved page. 

<details><summary>Screenshot:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19418601/180585586-ca8f3b68-7a13-456e-a11e-b80b11f15889.png)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese Other extensions used: | este complemento y dns de adguard.

comment.body: The AdGuard team has been known for needing the original link that resulted in the bad redirection; whereas I can't feasibly block it in my lists either because the arrival page is hosted on CloudFlare. Sorry.
